about_the_game:
Learn about salts in this fast-moving assembly line game. Identify each salt by formula or by name and assemble it from available ions. Get instant feedback and improve over time. Beat 8 levels in escalating difficulty. Answer in-game questions to capture the learning.

Curriculum fit: Salts are taught in the curriculum of 8th grade Basic Chemistry in most countries. However, the VR lesson can be enjoyed by players of any age wishing to learn.

Download the free Lesson Plan under ‘View the Manual’ on the right to maximize learning from this VR lesson, including a short quiz.

ASSEMBLE SALTS

Salts VR lesson requires the player to identify salts written on each crate and "assemble" them using available ions.

GET INSTANT FEEDBACK

When player makes a mistake, feedback with the correct answer is displayed immediately, enabling the player to improve.

LEARN MORE WITH EACH LEVEL

The Salts VR lesson consists of 8 levels in ascending difficulty. Additional difficulty is introduced by balancing a salt's charge as well as learning each salt's name, formula and ionic composition.

ANSWER REFLECTION QUESTIONS

At key points during the game, the player can answer questions designed to help reinforce key learnings.

When you finish the game, take the test at the back of the Lesson Plan to see if you can balance equations on paper as well as you can in this VR lesson.
